description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Power Field, Proven (4)

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Lightning Claws of the Astral Claws Chapter. Comes as a Pair of Lightning Claws that are requisitioned as one item and designed to be worn as a pair. When used against a Force Field, that Force Field decreases its Protection Rating by 10 and Increases its Overload Rating by 5.
